reviews.review_msg: I find her very nice and somehow motivational for me to do great in the course! She made slides that looks confusing at first but if you really pay attention to her speech and follow the pointing then it's easy to understand. Dont know what's wrong but it was good for me!
Awful !! Reads out all the slides very hard to understand, she takes attendance but no marks for it , really bad in teaching . Everyone walks out from her class. She is nice though !
